long_description: For core protection on hikes, wear the women's Marmot Leadville Vest. Its soft-shell fabric is windproof, water-resistant and breathable to keep you warm. Choose the Leadville for dry, moderate-to-cold weather and for moderate aerobic activities. GORE-TEX(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric eliminates windchill, yet it's breathable and quickly dissipates excess moisture to keep you dry and warm. Venting side panels offer comfortable stretch and increase breathability. Full-length front zipper features an inner draft flap; DriClime(R)-lined chin guard and collar are soft against skin. Hem drawcord seals in heat. Zippered handwarmer pockets and chest pocket; interior zip pocket. Marmot Leadville Vest for women features reflective logos for increased visibility in low-light conditions.
short_description: For core protection on hikes, wear the women's Marmot Leadville Vest. Its soft-shell fabric is windproof, water-resistant and breathable to keep you warm.
